name: Blue Boy's Magic
author: Ross
notes:
The deck got me addicted to Duel Links again 11-0 to KOG
Optimsed straight, wouldn't switch anything, You just gotta know how to play spellbooks,which is easier said than done.Every card plays a hidden role that you will slowly figure out as you play the deck more.For example, Spellbook of Power barely gets activated for its base effect but it is very usefull for getting 3 spellbooks in the grave turn 1 and for a tricky discard to PROC fate
Call me a SpellBook Main
Note: Tricky is the second best card in my deck after Fate,He's a beast in this.
